DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this phase III study is to determine the safety and efficacy of difluprednate in the treatment of inflammation following ocular surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Difluprednate in the Treatment of Inflammation Following Ocular Surgery (ST-601-004)
DOC.criteria: Scheduled for unilateral ocular surgery. Systemic administration of any corticosteroid or immunosuppressive drug in the 2 weeks prior to study enrollment.
